definition: diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: Layout analysis is the foundation of engineering drawing recognition.
sentences.chinese: 工程图版面分析是实现自动读图的前提。

sentences.english: The design of virtual model measuring system for engineering graphics is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 研究了工程图学课程中虚拟测绘模型的设计。

sentences.english: Can you give us the full technical specifications and engineering drawings?
sentences.chinese: 你能给我们完整的技术说明和工程图么？

sentences.english: The engineer taught us how to read the working drawing.
sentences.chinese: 工程师教我们如何看懂工程图。

sentences.english: The results of the experiment show BPN can be applied to recognize character of engineering drawings.
sentences.chinese: 实验结果表明BP网络可应用于工程图中的字符识别。

sentences.english: Also, individual deliverables such as engineering drawings are separate files.
sentences.chinese: 当然，二维工程图是一个分开的文档。

sentences.english: The paper describes a method that can creat a hole processing program automatically.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了利用工程图自动生成孔加工程序的方法。

sentences.english: The recognition of scanned image of engineering drawing is very difficult in pattern recognition.
sentences.chinese: 工程图纸扫描识别一直是模式识别中的难点问题。

sentences.english: In engineering, oblique axonometric drawing is useful.
sentences.chinese: 在工程图中，斜轴测图是很有用的。

sentences.english: Provide clear visibility to all engineering drawings that refer to a PSCS or CCS.
sentences.chinese: 使的所有的工程图面有一个可视化的参照。

sentences.english: The automatic input and understanding of engineering drawings has been extensively studied for recent years.
sentences.chinese: 工程图自动输入技术是近年来的研究热点之一。

sentences.english: This paper describes the present situation of the integrated system of engineering drawings processing.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了工程图纸处理集成系统的发展现状。

sentences.english: Make copies of engineering drawings for production other company employees as required.
sentences.chinese: 为产品及其他公司职员所需要的工程图纸副本。

sentences.english: The location of nameplate is specified on the engineering drawing.
sentences.chinese: 铭牌的位置在工程图纸中指定。

sentences.english: Engineering drawings are fundamental to CAD and CAM.
sentences.chinese: 工程图纸是索网式缆索起重机机械生产的基础。

sentences.english: Analyzes engineering drawings to determine processes necessary to manufacture part.
sentences.chinese: 能够解析工程图纸，确定生产过程中的必要程序。

definition: a plan/a planar graph/a plane figure
